meanings.sent1: She tried to straighten the crooked line.
meanings.sent2: Please straighten your back while sitting.
meanings.sent3: He attempted to straighten the wobbly table with a stack of books.

meanings.definition: Put (something) in order or correct condition.
meanings.sent1: He needed to straighten his messy room before his parents arrived.
meanings.sent2: Can you straighten the papers on the desk?
meanings.sent3: She had to straighten out the misunderstanding with her friend.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic had to straighten the bent car frame after the accident.
meanings.sent5: The tailor had to straighten the seams of the dress for a perfect fit.
